name: Cash2thepeople
tagline: I want to create different Webapplications that spread money to the people
body:
### Welcome to Cash2thepeople.

Cash2thepeople is about closing the gap in the rich-poor-sissor. I came up with the idea to create different type of companies that will share its revenue with the customers. My thought is to keep 10% of the winnings and give away 90% in 10.000$ packages randomly to customer-numbers.

### First Project

The first project is a webapplication. You can click through video-adds and banner-adds and then click on "win now"

### Second Project

The second project is a social network. I have alot of ideas how to shape it ! Facebook makes over 12.000.000â‚¬ just by adds. Imagine a big amount of this money being spread to the people in 10.000$ packages

### Third Project

The third project is the equal to the social network but it`s a video streaming host like youtube

### later projects

later projects will be something like ebay and then Markets, Carfactories and so on !
